me3_not_installed_desc: The manager needs Mod Engine 3 installed to work properly.
win_tutorial_title: How to Use ME3 Mod Manager | Full Setup & Mod Installation Guide
linux_tutorial_title: How to Use ME3 Mod Manager | Full Setup & Mod Installation Guide for Linux
help_about_label:
This application helps you manage all mods supported by Mod Engine 3.
Use the options below to update or install ME3.
me3_not_installed_tip: ME3 is not installed, cannot update.
me3_not_installed_warning: ME3 is not installed. Please install it first before trying to update.
custom_installer_question_win:
This will download and install ME3 {version} to: 
 {install_path} 

 The installation directory will be added to your user PATH. 

 Do you want to continue?
linux_installer_question_linux:
This will run the {script_type} ME3 installer script.

Do you want to continue?
add_new_game_desc:
Use this dialog to manually add a game supported by ME3.
This feature is intended for future updates where support for new games may be added.
game_name_example_label: The display name for your game
game_mods_example_label: Folder name where mods will be stored (no spaces, lowercase recommended)
game_cli_example_label: ME3 command-line identifier (lowercase, hyphens instead of spaces)
mods_dir_already_used: Mods directory '{mods_dir}' is already used by another game.
profile_file_already_used: Profile file '{profile}' is already used by another game.
cli_id_already_used: CLI ID '{cli_id}' is already used by another game.
remove_game_text:
Are you sure you want to remove '{game_name}'?

This will delete all associated profiles, settings, and configurations.
restore_default_game_text: Select a default game to restore:
all_default_games_present: All default games are already present.
app_update_available:
üîî New version available: v{latest_version}
Download update
platform_info_desc_linux: Use the Linux installation scripts from the Help/About dialog instead.
platform_info_desc_win: Use the Windows installer download from the Help/About dialog instead.
installation_detected_text:
ME3 v{current_version} has been successfully installed!
The application has been refreshed.
me3_command_not_found: 'me3' command not found. Make sure it is installed and in your system's PATH.
update_process_timeout: The update process timed out after {minutes} minutes.
platform_error_text_win: Windows installer download is only available on Windows.
platform_error_text_win2: Custom Windows installer is only available on Windows.
platform_error_text_linux: Linux installer is not available on Windows. Use the Windows installer instead.
failed_extract: Failed to extract any files from the archive.
download_file_not_vaild: Downloaded file is not a valid ZIP archive.
add_user_path_failed: Installation completed but failed to add to user PATH environment variable.
load_order_description: Configure which mods this mod should load before or after:
load_order_help_load_before: A list of dependencies that this mod should load before
load_order_help_load_after: A list of dependencies that this mod should load after
load_order_help_optional: If false, treat missing dependency as a critical error (required field)
load_order_help_note: Each mod can only be selected once across both lists
load_order_help_runtime: Dependencies are checked at runtime - ensure target mods exist in your profile
optional_setting_tooltip: If true, game continues if this mod fails to load
finalizer_tooltip: Function to call when mod is unloaded
native_module_help_optional_description: If false and this native fails to load, treat as critical error (default: false)
native_module_help_initializer_descripti: Optional symbol called after this native successfully loads
native_module_help_function_description: Call a specific symbol/function in the DLL
native_module_help_delay_description: Wait specified milliseconds before calling initializer
native_module_help_finalizer_description: Optional symbol called when this native is queued for unload
;padding: ; (this line is a padding to prevent issues with some INI parsers)
save_error_msg: No config file path is set. Use 'Browse...' to select a file.
game_options_description: Configure ME3 game options. These settings will be saved to the ME3 configuration file.
change_location_tooltip: Choose from available ME3 config locations to prevent multiple config files
me3_config_file_info: üí° The manager searches all ME3 config paths and uses the first found config file. Use 'Change Location...' to choose from available writable locations.
boot_boost_checkbox: Enable boot boost for faster startup
steam_directory_info: üí° Specify a custom Steam installation directory if ME3 cannot auto-detect it.
custom_executable_info: üí° Specify a custom executable if ME3 cannot auto-detect your game installation.
steam_validation_message:
The selected directory doesn't appear to contain Steam:
{steam_path}

Expected to find 'steam.exe' (or 'steam') and/or 'steamapps' folder.

Do you want to use this directory anyway?
create_error_msg: Failed to create default config file
no_writable_paths_msg: No writable ME3 configuration paths are available.
choose_config_location_desc: Choose where to create or use the ME3 configuration file (me3.toml):
choose_config_location_info: üí° Select a location where the me3.toml file exists or can be created. This prevents having multiple config files in different locations.
config_setup_error_message: Failed to set up the config file at the selected location.
feature_not_available_message: ME3 info manager is not available.
browse_error_message: Failed to browse for config location: {error}
configuration_error_message: Expected executable name for '{game_name}' is not defined.
executable_mismatch_message: The selected file does not match the required executable for {game_name}.
executable_mismatch_suggestion: Please choose the correct file named {expected_exe_name}.
steam_directory_required_message: Please provide a Steam directory path or uncheck the option.
executable_path_required_message: Please provide an executable path or uncheck the option.
save_success_message: Game options for {game_name} have been saved successfully.
save_error_message: Failed to save some settings. Please check that ME3 is properly installed.
configure_game_options_tooltip: Configure game options (skip_logos, boot_boost, skip_steam_init, exe)
add_external_mod_tooltip: Add an external mod (.dll) from any location
export_setup_tooltip: Export current profile with referenced mods (zip)
drag_drop_zone_text: üìÅ Drag & Drop mods with option to drop .me3 profiles here!
filter_enabled_tooltip: Show all enabled mods (DLLs and Folders)
filter_with_regulation_tooltip: Show enabled FOLDER mods with regulation.bin
filter_without_regulation_tooltip: Show enabled FOLDER mods without regulation.bin
profile_saved_status: Profile saved for {game_name}. Reloading mod list...
import_one_profile_warning: Please import only one .me3 profile at a time.
overwrite_confirm_text: The following files/folders already exist in the mods folder. Overwrite?
install_cancelled_status: Installation cancelled or no new items to install.
import_profile_mods_desc: You are about to import a profile and its associated mods.
import_merge_or_replace_question: Do you want to merge this with your current setup or replace it?
name_imported_package_desc: Enter a name for the imported package mod(s).
savefile_preference_message:
The current profile uses savefile '{current_savefile}', but the imported profile uses '{imported_savefile}'.

Select Yes to use the imported savefile, or No to keep the current one.
mod_folder_exists_replace_question: Mod folder '{mod_name}' already exists. Replace it?
symlink_rejected_msg: Installation of '{name}' was rejected because it contains symbolic links, which are not permitted.
symlink_rejected_package_msg: Installation rejected because the selected package contains symbolic links. Please remove them and try again.
symlink_rejected_items_msg: Installation rejected because one or more of the selected items contain symbolic links. Please remove them and try again.
invalid_destination_path_msg: Installation of '{name}' failed due to an invalid destination path. The mod must be installed within the main mods directory.
absolute_path_in_profile_msg: Profile contains an absolute path, which is not allowed for security reasons.
invalid_mod_name_msg: Invalid mod name. The name contains illegal characters, is a reserved system name, or is too long.
overwrite_dll_confirm_text: The following DLLs already exist in the mods folder. Overwrite?
dll_install_cancelled_status: DLL installation cancelled or no new DLLs to install.
name_mod_package_desc:
Enter a name for this mod package.
All content will be grouped under this name.
new_mod_name_desc: Enter a name for the new mod containing these {count} items:
bundle_items_failed_msg: Failed to bundle items into mod '{mod_name}': {error}
mods_dir_not_found_warning: Warning: Mods directory for active profile not found.
delete_mod_confirm_question: Are you sure you want to delete '{mod_name}'?
mods_dir_not_exist_msg:
The mods directory does not exist yet:
{mods_dir}
me3_required_for_launch_msg:
Mod Engine 3 is required to launch games with mods.

Would you like to install ME3 now?
cli_id_not_found_msg: Could not determine CLI ID for {game_name}
custom_exe_requires_terminal_info: Custom executable launch requires the terminal. This setting will be ignored.
new_profile_name_desc: Enter a name for the new profile:
select_folder_for_profile_title: Select a Folder for the New Profile
no_folder_selected_msg: No folder was selected. Please choose a folder to create the profile.
folder_in_use_desc:
The selected folder {folder_name} is already being used by another profile.

Each profile must have its own unique folder for its mods.

Please choose or create a different folder.
delete_profile_confirm_question:
Are you sure you want to delete profile '{profile_name}'?

This will NOT delete the actual mod files.
regulation_active_tooltip: This regulation file is currently active
regulation_inactive_tooltip: Click to make this the active regulation file
auto_launch_steam_win_checkbox: Auto-launch Steam silently on app startup
auto_launch_steam_linux_checkbox: Auto-launch Steam silently on app startup (via flatpak-spawn)
steam_not_found_status: Steam not found or ME3 not installed
steam_path_unavailable_tooltip: Steam path not available - requires ME3 to be installed
check_for_updates_checkbox: Check for ME3 updates on startup
running_on_host_status: Running command on host system via flatpak-spawn...
profile_settings_tooltip: Configure profile-level settings (custom save files, online mode)
profile_settings_description: Configure profile-level settings such as custom save files, online mode, and compatibility options.
default_profile_version_info: Choose the version used when saving and creating profiles. Existing profiles will be converted on activation.
savefile_placeholder: Enter custom save file name (without extension)
savefile_info: üí° Custom save file names allow you to use different save files for different mod setups. Choose .sl2 for vanilla gameplay or .co2 for seamless co-op mod.
savefile_warning_recommend_custom: ‚ö†Ô∏è This profile is using the game's default save file. To avoid overwriting your vanilla saves, enable 'Use custom save file name' and set a unique name.
start_online_info: ‚ö†Ô∏è Enable this to start the game in online mode. Disable for offline play or when using mods that require offline mode. (it is not needed for Seamless Co-op)
disable_arxan_checkbox: Disable Arxan anti-tamper for this profile
disable_arxan_info: üí° Arxan (GuardIT) is an anti-debug/tamper system used in some FROM games. Enabling this option instructs Mod Engine 3 to neutralize Arxan at runtime, which can help avoid crashes and allow certain mods or debugging tools to work.
savefile_required_message: Please enter a save file name or disable the custom save file option.
invalid_savefile_message: The save file name contains invalid characters or is too long. Please use only letters, numbers, spaces, and underscores.
profile_settings_save_success: Profile settings have been saved successfully.
add_to_steam_info: Adds a non-Steam shortcut to your Steam library that launches this game's current profile via ME3. Restart Steam to see the shortcut.
gamepage_savefile_warning: Your current profile does not use a custom save file. To protect your vanilla saves, configure a unique save file name in Profile Settings.
profile_compare_header: Select two profiles to compare their enabled DLLs and packages.
